SEARCH
Package com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers

Class ReviewController

java.lang.Object
com.projectps.buildingmanagement.controllers.ReviewController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/reviews") public class ReviewController extends Object
This controller class handles HTTP requests related to property reviews.

  • Method Details

    • getAllReviews

      @GetMapping("/reviewsList") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getAllReviews()
      Retrieves all property reviews.
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "reviewsList" and a list of review DTOs

    • getAllReviewsCustomer

      @GetMapping("/reviewsListCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getAllReviewsCustomer()
      Retrieves all property reviews for customers.
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "reviewsListCustomer" and a list of review DTOs

    • getReviewById

      @GetMapping("/searchReview") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getReviewById(@RequestParam(required=false) String id)
      Retrieves a review by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the review to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "searchReview" and the retrieved review DTO

      @GetMapping("/searchReviewCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getReviewByIdCustomer(@RequestParam(required=false) String id)

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the review to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "searchReviewCustomer" and the retrieved review DTO

    • showInsertReviewPage

      @GetMapping("/insertReviewCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView showInsertReviewPage()
      Displays the insert review page for customers.
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "insertReviewCustomer"

    • createReview

      @PostMapping("/insertReviewCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView createReview(@ModelAttribute ReviewDTO reviewDTO)
      Creates a new review for a property by a customer.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - the review DTO containing review details
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "insertReviewCustomer" and a success message or an error message

    • getReviewForUpdate

      @GetMapping("/updateReviewCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView getReviewForUpdate(@RequestParam(required=false) String id)
      Retrieves a review for updating by its ID for customers.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the review to update
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "updateReviewCustomer" and the review DTO to update

    • updateReviewCustomer

      @PostMapping("/updateReviewCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateReviewCustomer(@RequestParam(required=false) String id, @ModelAttribute ReviewDTO reviewDTO)
      Updates a review for customers.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the review to update
      reviewDTO - the updated review DTO containing review details
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView containing the view "updateReviewCustomer" and a success message or an error message

    • deleteReviewCustomer

      @PostMapping("/deleteReviewCustomer") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteReviewCustomer(@RequestParam(name="id") UUID id)
      Deletes a review for customers.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the review to delete
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView redirecting to the reviewsListCustomer page with an error message or a success message
